conversations.content: Ilia's Hideout
He...llllo... My...naaaame...Mordecai?
Aw, that was great, buddy! Nice job! You've got your intro down pat.
Intro...downpat?
Yeah, it means you've gotten better. It's a good thing.
Goodthing. Happy then. Thank you, Ilia.
Hee hee! Ilia and Mordecai almost sound like mother and son.
It's giving me flashbacks to when I was a little girl living with my own mother.
I'm glad to see Ilia forming relationships with others, but...
But his being an otherworldly life-form still worries you.
Yes. There's no telling what influence an organism removed from this world's laws might have.
What should we work on next, Mordecai? I'm happy to teach you whatever I know!
Whatever?
That is a dangerous offer, Ilia.
Danger...russ.
What do you mean?
You know dragons dislike creatures who are not of this world.
Offering one knowledge is tantamount to inviting it to dinner and giving it a bed.
You risk drawing the dragons' ire.
If you worry about the worst-case scenario, you'd never get ANYTHING done! Sheesh! Besides, if they get mad, I'll deal with it.
Why must you ALWAYS be like this?! Do you not understand how much I worry about you?!
And why must YOU constantly forget that I'm a grown woman who doesn't need protecting all the dang time?!
Ilia. Meene.
Now, now! Let's all take a deep breath, calm down, and attempt to—
What was that?!
Are we under attack?! I'll go check!
Ilia, no! Get back here!
That sound... I know...
Huh?
What IS that charred and blackened thing?
Yeaaah, this is one of my tools for experiments. Or it was, anyway.
Have you been doing dangerous experiments again?
No! Do you seriously think I'd mess something this basic up?
Then who is responsible for it?
It...me.
Mordecai?
Try to imitate Ilia. But then...
Wait, you tried to perform alchemy?!
Just wanted know more about what Ilia does...
But...broke. Scared everyone.
Meene right. Danger russ for me...learn.
Mordecai, you're—
I sorry!
You're AMAZING! I can't believe you started experimenting all by yourself!
...Not angry?
Why would I be angry? This is a HUGE milestone in your growth!
Growth goodthing. But if I didn't want learn, not break thing.
I think you've got the wrong idea, buddy.
Gaining knowledge isn't a bad thing. All that matters is what's in the heart of the person who learns it.
Heart...
You said you conducted that experiment because you wanted to know more about the stuff I was doing, right?
Well, there's nothing bad about that. It's just pure curiosity!
You've done nothing wrong, and no one is blaming you for anything.
Even if not from world?
Knowledge belongs to everyone, my man. We all have equal rights to learn.
Where you were born or what race you're from don't matter—no one's right to learn should EVER be denied.
Ilia...
Mom, you crossed the barriers between faeries and humans and taught me all sorts of things.
So how is that different from me teaching Mordecai?
True, but still...
Plus, teaching him about this world will help PREVENT more accidents!
You should know after raising me that there's no limit to curiosity.
*sigh* Very well. You win. I leave Mordecai's education to you.
Thanks! ...See, Mordecai? Now you don't have to feel bad about learning!
What if break Ilia things again?
Every success is built on a failure, buddy. That's just how you learn.
But if you seek out the reasons for your failures and let them lead you to success, it's all worth it in the end.
So let's study all sorts of things together. What do you say?
Thank you! Want learnmore about world! Muchmuch more!
Er, Ilia? Did I perhaps do something to offend Mordecai?
I don't think so. Why do you ask?
Because lately he has been very busy simply...staring at me.
Well, let's ask him. ...Hey! Mordecai!
Why are you watching Meene, bud?
Because she is pretty.
What?!
Do, uh...do you have a thing for her?
Meene's wings are very pretty. I want to look at them all the time.
Oh, THAT'S what you meant. Whew! I thought you had a crush or something.
Crush?
Actually, don't worry about it. Do you like pretty things, Mordecai?
Oh, yes. Meene, can I take off your wings so I can see them more closely?
My wings are NOT removable!
Oh. Then can Ilia make faerie wings with alchemy?
Hmmm... Synthesizing faerie wings sounds like an interesting challenge, honestly. Mind if I look into it, Meene?
Don't YOU start in with the crazy talk!
Ha ha ha! Sorry. I was only kidding.
You know, Mordecai, there are lots of pretty things besides faerie wings.
Really?!
Really. Here, lemme show you. Come with me, everybody!
Wow!
Yeah, this lake is one of my favorite hang-out spots. Super pretty, right?
A lakeside picnic is a wonderful idea!
It truly is gorgeous here.
Does water always light up like this?
That isn't the water lighting up, actually: It's sunlight reflecting off the surface.
Reflecting...
That's right. When light touches a surface, it bounces and scatters in a bunch of different directions.
And THAT is what makes this scene so beautiful! Pretty cool stuff, huh?
Ah! Ilia! Was that a faerie in the sky?
In the sky...? Oh! No, that wasn't a faerie. That's an animal called a bird.
Birds fly in the sky like faeries?
That's right. They have wings just like faeries that let them fly.
That must be nice.
Hmm... Maybe I should have synthesized a body with some wings attached to it.
A good parent knows not to spoil her child.
Hee hee! ...Hmm? Oh dear! The mana flow is starting to warp!
Everyone, get down!
Whew! The sound was pretty far off. And since it was just once, it was probably just a test round.
Still, it gave me quite a start. Why would the army be doing training exercises here?
Ilia, let's go to the sound right now!
What's the hurry?
The bird fell down. We have to help.
What?!
...Looks like the soldiers have cleared out.
Why are you hiding, Ilia?
If someone from the army saw us, it would get...complicated. Let's look for that bird. You're worried about it, aren't you?
Yes. I hope it isn't hurt.
*ch-chirp*
There!
Mordecai, wait!
I found it! Over here!
It's badly injured... I shall treat it at once.
That's a wound from a manacaster. It must have gotten caught up in the military exercise.
Why is the army exercising?
'Cause us humans are fighting a war with the dragons at the moment.
War...?
Yeah, war. It means killing each other.
Killing... Why?
Because the civilization the humans have built is eating away at dragonkind.
And humans would rather fight than surrender what they have made.
Both sides are fighting for their survival, and the ripples from that fight keep reaching further and further out.
This war is between humans and dragons?
Then why was the bird shot?
I'm afraid that's how war is, buddy.
Once it breaks out, everything around it gets swept up in the fighting.
Heck, this whole beautiful scene around us could all get turned to ash soon.
That isn't fair. It's too sad.
Yeah, it's an ugly truth for sure, but that's what's happening right now.
I wish the world were full of nothing but pretty things, but it's not, and it sucks.
The bird has been healed.
Really?!
*cheep* *cheep* *cheep*
Fit as a fiddle, this one.
Thank you, Zethia. I'm very glad.
This world isn't just pretty things...
Ilia, where did you want me to put this book you lent... Oh. She's not here.
She's out with Meene.
Oh. Well, I shall have to come by at a different time to drop this off.
What is the book about?
Alchemy. I'm nowhere near as well-versed as she is and wanted to study up.
Were you reading as well, Mordecai?
I was. Would you like to try these next?
Hmm, let's see. You have history... A bit of philosophy...
These are rather advanced tomes! Did you really read them all?
This surprises you?
I mean no offense, but it was only recently that you even learned how to introduce yourself properly.
Ilia is a very good teacher.
But there are still many things I do not understand. I wish to learn more about myself.
I bear a human's appearance, and thought I might learn more of myself if I studied them, but...
Er, Mordecai? Is something on my face?
Zethia, you ARE human, yes?
What?! Y-yes, of course I am.
I see. At times you give off the same feeling that I do, so I was curious.
(Ah, I suppose I do technically come from another world. In that regard, I am not so different from him.)
But you are not from this part of the world, so where do you come from?
I come from...a place very, very far away.
Do humans fight there as well?
Yes, we also engage in war.
It seems humans love nothing more than to declare war and fight.
Zethia, is that the purpose of mankind? Is your kind born into the world to kill?
What makes you think that?
Humans can speak to one another, and are rather swift learners.
Yet instead of understanding each other, they choose to fight.
Is it so strange to wonder if that is the purpose for which they are born?
I suppose I can't blame you for thinking that when you see the horrors of war.
But human life is about more than battle.
Ask a person what they were born to do, and each individual will answer differently. That holds for more than just humans.
What were you were born to do, Zethia?
Heh. That is a rather difficult question. But if I had to choose one thing to call the meaning of my life...
As the Auspex, my purpose is to pray for a safe and prosperous future for the world, as well as all the people within it.
To pray for the future?
That's right. My body is host to holy mana.
This mana responds to prayer by granting blessings and prosperity to the world.
So I pray for everyone to be happy.
This is surely the reason I was put here.
(Not to mention my other duties...)
The Other is a foe beyond your strength, yet you alone can purify this evil.
A feat that only I can manage, yet one I cannot manage alone? We are doomed if this is so!
But you have me...and I have your power.
With the two of us together, your power doubles—which means we may yet dispel his foul presence!
HaaaAAAH!
BEGONE FROM THIS WORLD, OTHER!
(...No. That story is not for his ears.)
That is rather remarkable.
How do you mean?
You think of others beyond yourself.
It's nothing so special...
I have my hands full worrying about me.
Even there, I barely understand who I am.
I am not human, nor of this world.
But I am ALIVE here in this world, so what meaning does that hold?
What do YOU think, Mordecai?
I fear thinking has not led to an answer, nor has a veritable pile of books.
Until I met Ilia, there was no meaning.
Do you suppose there COULD be meaning to someone like me being born?
(He is an otherworldly being, just like the Other.)
(But he, too, has his own hopes and worries...)
I believe there is meaning, yes—even if it is something you cannot see or understand at the present time.
No life in this world is without purpose.
Then I can only hope the day will come when I will know mine.
Ilia, what is the meaning of my life?
PFFFFFT! *cough* *wheeeeze*
Are you all right?
Yep! I'm good! Just did the ol' spit take with my herbal tea just now.
I didn't think you'd be whacking me over the noggin with a lead pipe of a question first thing in the morning.
My question is a pipe?
Just means that it's tough and heavy. Oh, and really unexpected.
Now I KNOW he's learning from you; you used to hit me with so many such questions, it's a wonder my wings didn't fall off in the night.
Yeah, that sounds like me, all right. Anyway, Mordecai, back to your question.
You want to know the reason you were born, right?
Yes. I was summoned to this world and given flesh, and now I live a life here.
What meaning does that hold? Please explain, Ilia.
Ummmmmmmm...
Is this question hard even for you?
I don't know if I'd say that. It's more like... Hmm, how do I put this?
No, I should just give it to you straight. You have a right to know.
Mordecai, the reason you were granted a body here is actually—
Whoa! What's that sound?!
It's the intruder alert system! Someone's near the hideout!
We should skedaddle into the woods. Everybody out the back, quickly!
...Good. The soldiers moved on. Let's split while the coast is clear.
Right. ...Waugh?!
Noises from over this way, sir!
Damn!
I'm sorry, Ilia.
It's fine. I'm the one they're after. If I split off, they'll follow me.
You guys use that time to run.
Absolutely not! It's too dangerous precisely BECAUSE they're after you!
At this rate, we're all gonna be caught! Take care of Mordecai and Zethia, Meene!
Ilia, wait!
I'll go with her.
Mordecai, now YOU wait!
*huff* *pant* Well, I managed to get their attention focused on me, but now...
There! It's Ilia! After her!
These guys just do NOT let up!
There's nowhere left to run.
Oh, come on!
A pincer maneuver against one little girl? You guys are getting desperate.
We'll see how long your jokes last when you're dragged before Lord Augus, girl.
Your research will end this fell war. What nobler end could you wish for your life's work?
I might buy that if I thought you jokers had any intention of actually ending the war.
You impudent... So be it! If you'll not obey willingly, I will have you brought to heel by force of arms!
All right, Ilia. Time for an amazing plan...
ILIAAAAAAAA!
GAH?!
Who the devil—BLARGH!
Ilia, are you all right?
Mordecai?! Why are you here?
We need to run. Now.
R-right!
Nrgh... After them! GO!
...Have we lost them?
I think so. And hey, thanks for that. You saved my buns back there.
I now see what you meant when you said the army would spell trouble for you.
Yeeaaah, they're pretty clingy.
Let's head back to Meene and Zethia. They must be worried.
Of course.
...What's up? You wanted to talk to me?
(Hmm? I hear voices.)
They're still trying to make you open an otherworld gate?
(Meene and...Ilia? I wonder what they are talking about.)
They said my work would ＂end the war.＂ Unbelievable...
They're clearly still trying to harness the power of other worlds into a weapon.
(Then she is being chased because of her research into other worlds.)
(They made her open a gate so they might create a weapon.)
(Then the reason I was born is...)
If I truly exist as a mere tool of war...
Then Ilia would be safer without me.
Thank you, Ilia—for everything. Farewell.
Meene! Zethia! We have a problem!
What's got you in such a tizzy first thing in the morning?
Mordecai is gone.
...I don't know where I am.
Which way is it to this ＂capital＂ where the army is stationed?
I've always had Ilia to lead the way up to this point.
I do hope she isn't cross with me for leaving so suddenly.
But no, this is for the best. After all, she said the army's plan was to use the power of other worlds in weapon form.
If the purpose of my existence is war, I must fulfill that role.
To live for war...
He...llllo... My...naaaame...Mordecai?
Aw, that was great, buddy! Nice job! You've got your intro down pat.
Did I study all those things for war?
It is good to bring war to an end, but to live for that purpose alone...
GrrrrRRRRR!
Aaah!
Otherworlder... Begone.
A dragon...
Unbeckoned life, your mere existence frays the weft of this world's order. Return to the world from whence you came!
It seems I have no choice!
Graaaagh! You fool!
Nnngh...
Return, I say! Return and never come back! You ought never have been called here!
Hrgh...
(Why did I run? Where am I trying to go?)
(Ah, the army. I must go to them. But... where am I?)
I don't understand anything anymore. What am I doing? What am I? ...Hrgh!
The dragon's wound cuts deep. I am not human, but I feel pain as they do.
Ilia crafted this flesh vessel well.
Your naaame...will beee...Mordecai!
Mordecai...?
Yeah! Mordecai, my beloved masterwork.
Ilia... I am...
*gasp* *heave* ...It's the dragon!
You'll not escape, otherworlder! I will not suffer you to live in this world!
GWAAAAUGH! Nrgh...
(Perhaps it would be better to die here...)
(If the alternative is a life meant for war... Then perhaps this is...)
DRIVE BUSTER!
Wha—?! *cough* *cough* Such dust...
Mordecai, this way! RUN!
Ilia?!
*huff* *pant* *gasp* ...Heh. Aaaah ha ha!
We swapped places since yesterday, huh? Well, glad we got out in one piece!
Now lemme see that wound— I'll do what first aid I can here.
R-right. Thank you.
...'Kay, that should last until we can have Zethia patch you up proper.
You okay, bud?
Is it all right for me to return with you?
Obviously! Why would you even ask that?
Because I was born for war.
Muh?!
I overheard you speaking with Meene.
I know the army wishes to use the power of other worlds to wage war, and that was the reason you opened the gate.
So I thought I ought to fulfill that purpose.
Is...that what you want?
No. Not at all. But what should I do?
That dragon before called me ＂otherworlder.＂
Yet I am here, alive in this world.
If a life of war is the only path ahead, then I must walk it, else I will have no right to exist in this world.
Okay, this is a BIG misunderstanding.
It's true that I opened the otherworld gate at the army's request.
But I didn't give you flesh so you could become their WEAPON!
Then why did you do it?
'Cause I wanted to talk to you.
Is that...the only reason?
That's it, bud. I never had any intentions for you past that.
That's why you caught me short when you asked what your purpose in life was.
Because it was just a selfish whim.
It wasn't selfish! I've enjoyed every moment I've spent with you.
Then I guess it's a good thing I whipped you up a body!
But we need to be clear on this, Mordecai: You don't have to live your life the way I tell you to.
No one can tell another person what the purpose of their life is supposed to be. You have to find that for yourself.
Really? But not knowing is so painful.
Is an outsider like me truly allowed to go on living here without a known purpose?
Meanings and purposes are the sort of things you figure out along the way.
Hmm? I don't understand.
Okay, think of it this way: How many lives do you think exist in this world?
I don't know.
Neither do I, and I'm kind of a genius. But it's gotta be a REALLY big number.
And there are probably just as many things you can learn by coming into contact with all those different lives.
Right now, you can be living in this world in order to figure out WHY you're living in this world. That works for a purpose, yeah?
Assuming you still want to live, that is.
I do, Ilia. I want to live.
I want to live with YOU!
Then let's get home already. The others are waiting for us!
Thank you, Ilia.
(If we all must find the meaning in our own lives...)
(Then for now, at least, I want to believe I am here to be a companion to Ilia.)
(For my world began when I met her...)
